Summary: White cigar with gold lights seen in clear daylight.
divs: Sighting Detailswalking dog in town and looked up into the sky to see a white to silver disc or cigar shaped object fairly high in the sky. Object had a row of about 6 bright amber to gold lights. Looked away from the sky for a moment and the object vanished from sight. The object was silent. This could not be an ordinary plain. While i was viewing the object for about 15- 20 second, the object seemed to slowly and quietly moving through the sky in my direction. The object vanished too quickly to be a plain since there was clear daylight and few clouds in the sky at the time.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ridgefield
There were no other sightings in Ridgefield on or around February 25th 2009
